messages.message: Ahh, I noticed that because we didn't have drive-related env vars in Cypress envs (both CI and jenkins), `drives` and `workspaces-drives-crud` tests didn't run at all :lmaocry:.
i was impressed with the smooth rollout of the new `workspace-drives-crud` test! :lolcry:
also very surprised that I never saw failing `drives`  tests when I work on the new drives UI

Digging a bit deeper. I think we never ran the `drives` tests in CI. The env vars never exist.
